# Management Information Systems Ms

## Program Overview

# Management Information Systems
Degree Type:
[Graduate School](https://www.uab.edu/graduate/) [Apply](https://cloud.reach.uab.edu/graduate-application) [Financing Your Degree](https://www.uab.edu/cost-aid/types-of-aid/loans)
[## Program Director
Dr. Barbara Wech
[bawech@uab.edu](mailto:bawech@uab.edu)
## About the Program
You're a techie, but you want the business skills you need to take your career to another level? Then you've
come to the right place. Our MS in Management Information Systems offers advanced skills training in project
management, cybersecurity, business analytics, and other emerging technologies.
In fact, we put together a curriculum to cover the skills you need in the real world. Your courses will
include IT and Business Strategy, IT Trends and Emerging Technologies, Technology Planning and Capital
Budgeting, Cyber Attacks and Threat Mitigation, and much more. You will be able to learn about business,
technology, leadership, and communication as it relates to tech careers. We specifically designed the
program for every level of IT professional – and put it all online so you can earn your degree while still
working.
### Concentrations
- Business Analytics with Information Technology
- Cyber Security Management
## Delivery Method
Earn your degree 100% online with a structured program offering guaranteed seating and accelerated courses with a tuition premium.
